mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST (POST_TITLE, POST_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID) VALUES (#{postTitle}, #{postContent}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM POST WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT p.ID AS id, p.POST_TITLE AS postTitle, p.MEMBER_ID AS memberId, m.MEMBER_NAME AS memberName, p.POST_DATE AS postDate, p.VIEWCOUNT AS viewCount, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COMMENT c WHERE c.POST_ID = p.ID) AS commentCount FROM POST p LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON p.MEMBER_ID = m.ID WHERE p.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}

SELECT p.ID AS id, p.POST_TITLE AS postTitle, p.MEMBER_ID AS memberId, m.MEMBER_NAME AS memberName, p.POST_DATE AS postDate, p.VIEWCOUNT AS viewCount, COALESCE(c.commentCount, 0) AS commentCount FROM POST p LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON p.MEMBER_ID = m.ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT POST_ID, COUNT(*) AS commentCount FROM COMMENT GROUP BY POST_ID ) c ON p.ID = c.POST_ID ORDER BY p.POST_DATE DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT p.ID AS id, p.POST_TITLE AS postTitle, p.MEMBER_ID AS memberId, m.MEMBER_NAME AS memberName, p.POST_DATE AS postDate, p.POST_UPDATED_TIME AS postUpdatedTime, p.VIEWCOUNT AS viewCount, p.POST_CONTENT AS postContent FROM POST p LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER m ON p.MEMBER_ID = m.ID WHERE p.ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE POST SET POST_TITLE = #{postTitle}, POST_CONTENT = #{postContent}, POST_UPDATED_TIME = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE ID = #{id}
